item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Aceron4, post:5, topic:386481”]Hm, isn’t Blankscape Delta Based? And if so i think the teleport and additem stuff should be like

and

etc, etc.

But Idk. I dont work with Delta Much.[/quote]
Will try, if works, will rep.

Read full topic

@Fridder wrote:

Don’t know anything about “Blankscape”, so make sure you put that in your Client.java file server-sided, and make sure its under an existing command.

item.title: Why are these commands not working? Will Rep+
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

I added a truck full of commands and compiled it. I got no error so i got on my client and source, I put the commands, and they didn’t work! The commands are:


if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("Chill City")){                     
teleportToX = 2815;
teleportToY = 3182;
addItem(1038,1);
addItem(1040,1);
addItem(1042,1);
addItem(1044,1);
addItem(1046,1);
addItem(1048,1);
addItem(1050,1);
addItem(1053,1);
addItem(1055,1);
addItem(1057,1);
sendMessage("Welcome to the Chill Zone! "+player+" , you should relax, take a break from all your hard training!");
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" is now in Chill City to chill and relax! Come and join him/her at ::chill city!";
}

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("Waterfall")){                      
teleportToX = 2534;
teleportToY = 3511;
sendMessage("Welcome to the Waterfall! "+player+" , you should do ::god and click the waterfall to see what happens!");
}

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("V")){                     
teleportToX = 3210;
teleportToY = 3424;
sendMessage("Welcome to Varrock! ");
}

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("F")){                      
teleportToX = 2964;
teleportToY = 3378;
sendMessage("Welcome to Falador! ");
}

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("L")){                      
teleportToX = 3222;
teleportToY = 3218;
sendMessage("Welcome to Lumbridge! ");
}

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("C")){                       
teleportToX = 2757;
teleportToY = 3477;
sendMessage("Welcome to Camelot! ");
}

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("ALK")){                      
teleportToX = 3293;
teleportToY = 3174;
sendMessage("Welcome to Al-Kharid! ");
}

Or Pastebin:

http://pastebin.com/C7Zra9ve

Read full topic
